resources.string: Please click the button below to make a weekly subscription @100 /=

Hello!
 Welcome, am called B. 
 Would you like to ask me questions about your child? 
 You can also talk to a Doctor!

Breastfeeding is very fundamental 
 in child growth. It contains most 
 of the nutrients required by a growing child.
 Breastfeed at least twice a day!

This is always the long 
 awaited moment. most parents don not 
 prepare for it fully and end up with challenges.
 Ensure to shop all requirements before!
